bibl.title: Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993

bibl.seg: SHEEHAN Peter, The Roman Fortress of Babylon in Old Cairo.

Archaeological Research in Roman Egypt. The Proceedings of The Seventeenth Classical Colloquium of The Department of Greek and Roman Antiquities, British Museum, held on 1-4 December, 1993 = JRA. Supplementary Series. 19 (Ann Arbor, Michigan, 1996) pp. 95-97, 1 fig., 1 plan.
Report on an ongoing programme of research funded by the Canadian Centre for Architecture, the Deutsches Archäologisches Institut (Abteilung Kairo) and the Egypt Exploration Society.
